Improvements.Change_Diff:
- if (browserVersion_ == BrowserVersion.INTERNET_EXPLORER) { ... } else if (browserVersion_ == BrowserVersion.EDGE) { ... }
+ getExpectedAlertsForBrowser(alerts);
Improvements.Description: The same piece of code is being repeated multiple times for different browser versions. This could be reduced to a single method that takes in the appropriate annotation and browser version as parameters.

Improvements.Change_Diff:
- if (browserVersion_ == BrowserVersion.INTERNET_EXPLORER) { ... } else if (browserVersion_ == BrowserVersion.EDGE) { ... }
+ switch(browserVersion_) { case BrowserVersion.INTERNET_EXPLORER: ... case BrowserVersion.EDGE: ... }
Improvements.Description: Switch-case statements are generally more readable and efficient when you are comparing a variable to multiple values.
